CONTRACT_ID: Procurement, Delivery and Installation of Support Space – Collaborative Furniture to Edmonton
short_summary: Health Canada seeks bids for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture
description: Health Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa on or by March 31st, 2023. Bids must be received before 2 o'clock (EST), Friday 3 February 2023. Bids received after this time and date will not be considered. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). There is no security requirement associated with the requirement. For additional information, consult the bid solicitation document.

full_summary:
###Government Tender Announcement:

#### Tender Title and Details

* **Tender Reference:** PW-23-01022266
* **Tender Title:** Procurement, Delivery, and Installation of Support Space – Collaborative Furniture for Edmonton
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (Office Furniture)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Closing Date:** February 3, 2023 (14:00:00 ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Contact Information:**
	+ **Name:** Christian Belanger
	+ **Email:** christian.belanger@canada.ca
	+ **Phone:** 613-697-0681
	+ **Address:** 
		- 200 Eglantine Drive
		- Tunney's Pasture
		- Ottawa, ON
		- K1A 0K9
* **Contracting Entity:**
	+ **Name:** Health Canada
	+ **Address:** 
		- Address Locator 0900C2
		- Ottawa, ON
		- K1A 0K9
		- Canada

#### Tender Description

Health Canada requires the procurement, delivery, and installation of office furniture for their support space and collaborative areas in Edmonton by March 31st, 2023. The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to suppliers who have a General Stream of Suppliers (GSS) contract with the Government of Canada. Interested suppliers must submit their bids before 2:00 PM (ET) on February 3, 2023, to be considered.

#### Attachments

The following documents are available for download:
* [1000247502_rfb_eng_f.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/20/4becd1dfd5c0e72cbf7dfc6492f3c229/1000247502_rfb_eng_f.pdf)
* [1000247502_floor_plan_plan.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/20/b318c1e7574bf777
